p:
We synthesized NaGd(WO 4) 2:Eu 3+, NaGd(MoO 4) 2:Eu 3+, LaVO 4:Eu 3+, GdVO 4:Eu 3+, and GdVO 4:Dy 3+ nanophosphors following a procedure described elsewhere.
23âˆ’ 26 The optimized doping concentrations of Eu 3+ in each of these nanophosphors are, respectively, 12, 5, 5, and 10%. The doping concentration of Dy 3+ in the GdVO 4 matrix was fixed at 2%.
17 The nanophosphors were dispersed in methanol with a concentration of 5% by wt.
